question: What was the population of Sibiu, Romania, as per the 2011 census?
asked_question_translated: Hvor mange innbyggere bodde det i Sibiu, Romania, ved folketellingen i 2011?
answer: Ved folketellingen i 2011 hadde Sibiu, Romania, en befolkning p√• omtrent 147,245 innbyggere.
answer_translated_eng: As of the 2011 census, Sibiu, Romania had a population of approximately 147,245 inhabitants.
